communities.title: Official Starbase Resources
communities.description: The official Starbase wiki and Discord

communities.title: CYLON
communities.description: Cylon is an open non-faction community dedicated to forming a repository of knowledge for yolol, teaching said knowledge to others, and fostering research towards new knowledge. Anyone and everyone is free to join our pursuit of yolol!

docs.title: yolol-is-cylons
docs.description: A collection of resources related to yolol, its community standards, and what we hope it can become.

tools.title: vscode-yolol
tools.description: A vscode-extension that adds support for yolol and has bonus-features like auto-typing code into the game.

tools.title: yodk
tools.description: A Development-Toolkit for yolol, containing things like a code-checker, debugger, formatter, optimizer and a new high-level programming language that compiles to yolol.

tools.title: YololEmulator
tools.description: This is an emulator for Yolol. It allows you to input a file of Yolol code and execute it line by line.

tools.title: YAZUR
tools.description: An interpreter written in JavaScript, suitable for client- and serversided applications

tools.title: YASM (YololAssembler)
tools.description: YololAssembler is an assembler for a language called yasm which compiles into Yolol. Yasm is designed to produce code that is as compact as the best hand-written Yolol and is always compatible with in-game Yolol.

tools.title: Referee
tools.description: A Discord bot providing helpful utilities and a code-golf competition for the Yolol language. Join the CYLON Discord to participate!

tools.title: Yodine
tools.description: Yodine is a 2D editor and emulates StarBases data network system and yolol programming language.

tools.title: Yoloxide
tools.description: Yoloxide is a rust-based Yolol interpreter engine for the game Starbase.

tools.title: Yoloxide-Website
tools.description: A website that uses Yoloxide to let you write and run yolol in your browser.

libraries.title: martindevans/Yolol
libraries.description: A library for interacting with Yolol code from C#. It allows you to parse a string into an AST and execute the AST.
